name: Qin Shi Huang's Tomb
ability: Skill attacks have a slight chance of inflicting Petrifaction.

additional_data.description: A spirit who guards a tomb that symbolizes incredible power. It was built as an underground empire to provide an eternal afterlife for the first emperor of China, and this spirit's been managing it all on her own for quite some time. But due to its massive size she started needing an extra hand to help out sometimes. So at her request the Bureau of the Occult secretly began to manage information and data collection on her behalf. But some say she had other reasons for involving the Bureau...
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 1/10/16 - 30/11/16
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "I am an entire world in itself."
skill: "Time to get a little more serious."
